panels.description:
Number of GPUs in the cluster.

TODO: Currently it's showing k8s capacity. Ideally it should all underlying GPUs.
panels.title: Total GPUs

panels.description: Number of GPUs immediately assignable to jobs.
panels.title: Assignable GPUs

panels.description: Number of unhealthy GPUs in k8s or marked as unschedulable.

targets.expr: (sum(k8s_node_device_total{device_str='nvidia.com/gpu'})  OR on() vector(0)) - (sum(k8s_node_device_allocatable{device_str='nvidia.com/gpu'}) OR on() vector(0))

panels.title: Unhealthy GPUs

panels.description:
Number of GPUs assigned to jobs.

TODO: Exclude unhealthy but in use GPUs.
panels.title: Assigned GPUs

panels.description: Number of assigned GPUs having utilization > 0%.
panels.title: Active GPUs

panels.description: Number of assigned GPUs having utilization 0%.

targets.expr: (count(task_device_percent{device_str='nvidia.com/gpu'}) OR on() vector(0)) - (count(task_device_percent{device_str='nvidia.com/gpu'}>0) OR on() vector(0))

panels.title: Idle GPUs

panels.description:
Number of NPUs in the cluster.

TODO: Currently it's showing k8s capacity. Ideally it should all underlying NPUs.
panels.title: Total NPUs

panels.description: Number of NPUs immediately assignable to jobs.
panels.title: Assignable NPUs

panels.description: Number of unhealthy NPUs in k8s or marked as unschedulable.

targets.expr: (sum(k8s_node_device_total{device_str='npu.huawei.com/NPU'}) OR on() vector(0)) - (sum(k8s_node_device_allocatable{device_str='npu.huawei.com/NPU'}) OR on() vector(0))

panels.title: Unhealthy NPUs

panels.description:
Number of NPUs assigned to jobs.

TODO: Exclude unhealthy but in use NPUs.
panels.title: Assigned NPUs

panels.description: Number of assigned NPUs having utilization > 0%.
panels.title: Active NPUs

panels.description: Number of assigned NPUs having utilization 0%.

targets.expr: (count(task_device_percent{device_str='npu.huawei.com/NPU'}) OR on() vector(0)) - (count(task_device_percent{device_str='npu.huawei.com/NPU'}>0) OR on() vector(0))

panels.title: Idle NPUs

panels.description: Device numbers in the cluster over time.

targets.expr: (count(task_device_percent{device_str='nvidia.com/gpu'}) OR on() vector(0)) - (count(task_device_percent{device_str='nvidia.com/gpu'}>0) OR on() vector(0))
(count(task_device_percent{device_str='npu.huawei.com/NPU'}) OR on() vector(0)) - (count(task_device_percent{device_str='npu.huawei.com/NPU'}>0) OR on() vector(0))
